title: An Accompt of all the gold and silver coyned in His Majesties mint, within the Tower of London, from the first of Octob. 1599 ... to this present November, 1675 being seventy six years, divided into four parts, shewing how the coyn of this kingdom did increase in the three first parts proportional to the increase of trade and navigation, and how much it hath decreased in the fourth part, being since this present East India Company was erected in the year 1657.
author: England and Wales. Mint.
